job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: McDonald’s is looking to hire a Data Scientist who has a deep understanding of Advanced Analytics and Big Data. The role will mostly focus on descriptive analytics, reporting, visualization working closely with other data scientists and data engineers. A successful candidate has shown experience in managing projects and leading others to high impact timely results. We need an experienced person with knowledge on basic machine learning methods, ETL design and business intelligence tools. This position will collaborate cross functionally to understand and translate business needs into data driven solutions, you will communicate analyses and recommendations to cross-functional partners and decision makers. The position requires someone that seeks to supplement their skills using project experience, self-study, and ongoing training. This role has the opportunity to expand to advanced analytics, predictive and prescriptive models. Role and Responsibilities: Understand the customer experience domain, McDonald’s products, and business process to help create data driven insights and gather actionable conclusions about business metrics Apply statistical and machine learning methods to analyze large, complex data sets Design, development, and maintenance of descriptive analyses, and dashboards to drive key business decisions Partner with business teams to understand the problems and design scalable solution, data models, ETL process and make data driven insights accessible to the company through easy-to-understand visualizations Help team to identify and understand the necessary data sources for their project and the efficient ways to clean and transform it Qualifications Bachelor’s degree (3+ years) or an advanced degree in Information Technology, Computer Science, or a related discipline Knowledge of statistical analysis and basic machine learning models (regression models, decision trees, clustering, etc.) to analyze large, complex data sets. Knowledge on customer experience domain is a plus Strong experience using SQL, ETL and BI platforms such as Tableau or PowerBI. Experience using toolkits/frameworks from Python, R or Alteryx is preferred. Experience in building tools/products that have been deployed to production (e.g. in marketing, customer experience, etc.) Experience transforming raw requirements into a good analytics design Experience communicating complex technical problems into simple language to present the results back to business with supporting data Self-starter with a high level of intellectual curiosity Strong analytical skills and a problem-solving mindset Able to build a sense of trust and rapport that creates a comfortable and effective workplace Additional Information McDonald’s is proud to be one of the most recognized brands in the world, with restaurants in over 100 countries that serve 70 million customers daily.
